node.detail_zh: 患者為敬福護理院院友，無外遊紀錄，8 月 3 日因發燒入住明愛醫院，並於 8 月 6日轉至仁濟醫院，8 月 12 日凌晨 1 時 04 分離世。
node.detail_en: The patient is a resident of King Fok Nursing Home, Shun Ning Road, Cheung Sha Wan, with no travel history. He was admitted to Caritas Medical Centre on August 3 upon developing fever, and then transferred Yan Chai Hospital on August 6. He passed away at 1:04 a.m., August 12.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.name_en:
King Fok Nursing
Home, Shun Ning Road
groups.description_zh: 患者為深水埗順寧道敬福護理院院友、照顧員及工作人員。
groups.description_en: The patients of this cluster include residents, caretakers, and staff members of the King Fok Nursing Home, Shun Ning Road.
